title: [1.6.4][SSP/SMP]Chisel Facades 錾面MOD
author: 橡皮233
txt_content:
本帖最后由 包宇杰88 于 2014-7-28 22:43 编辑 

                              这个MOD叫做錾面MOD，诶？这是什么MOD?在原帖网站作者并没有做过多的介绍我先翻译一下                                 原文
 Overview


This is a small compatibility mod that adds Chisel's blocks as BuildCraft Facades.


Currently 648 of Chisel's block variations are added as Facades (548 with old-style pillars enabled).


Known Limitations


Facades of blocks that use any type of dynamic rendering (e.g. connected textures [Pillars, Snakestone] or animations [Lavastone]) will only display static textures. Snakestone facades will always display with the head pointing south.


If old-style pillars are enabled in Chisel's config, Facades won't be created for Marble Pillar Slabs. This is because the old-style slab texture doesn't display correctly as a Facade.


Facades aren't created for non-cubic blocks like Glass Panes, Iron Bars or Stairs. Facades are still created for Slabs, though.


Dependencies


Chisel Facades depends on Minecraft Forge, Chisel and BuildCraft (obviously). I recommend you use the latest 1.6.4 versions of each.


The latest version of Chisel for 1.6.4 is asie's update.


Installation


To install, simply place the downloaded JAR in your Minecraft mods folder.


Modpacks


You're free to use this in any modpack. I'd appreciate being notified, but it's not strictly necessary for you to do so.


Source Code


You can view the source code of the mod on GitHub. It's licensed under the MIT License.


Credits


Thanks to Pahimar for his Let's Mod Reboot series, which taught me some of the basics of modding. Thanks to JavaMatrix, Yvesm, Fir3will and Vic_ for their help in the minecraftforum.net Mod Development forum.





                            翻译
这是一个小的兼容性模式增加凿的块buildcraft面。
目前648块的变化作为墙（548的风格的支柱）。
已知的限制
块，使用任何类型的动态绘制立面（例如连接纹理[支柱，菊石]或[ ]动画lavastone）将只显示静态纹理。菊石的外立面将始终与头指向南方的显示。
如果老风格的支柱是凿的配置启用，门面不会大理石柱板了。这是因为老板的纹理显示不正确作为一个立面。
我建议您使用最新版本的每摇一。对于1.6.4凿是最新版本，该版本。
安装
安装，简单地把你的文件夹下载JAR。安装，简单地把你的MOD放到MODS文件夹
你可使用任何modpack。
源代码你可以在GitHub的MOD的源代码视图。
由于pahimar他让MOD重启系列，它教我一些基本的改装。
由于javamatrix，yvesm，在minecraftforum.net MOD发展论坛的帮助fir3will和vic_。由于javamatrix，yvesm，在minecraftforum.net MOD发展论坛的帮助fir3will和vic_。

意义不明啊！我们还是看看其他介绍我就喜欢搬运一些奇奇怪怪的MOD =w=
可以看到应该像是.....我自己想象一个....更多墙壁？？？？
这........我和我的小伙伴都惊呆了！！！是龙？不要来咬我啊QAQ
我貌似看到了苦力怕萌萌的脸












-------------------------------------------------END----------------------------------




观众：= =，怎么不会吧，就那么结束了？
楼主：对啊
观众：你好歹发个地址啊，不然你放学别跑！
楼主：QAQ，救命啊！我给你们就是了！
